name: Warrior Defenders
description:
Aliens invaded the Earth, we ask all the warriors to unite and protect the homeland all together. Hundreds of powerful heroes awaiting recruitment. Start forming your own exclusive team to defend the Earth with many warriors.
Game features:
TD battles, Mightier than a thousand
The battlefield is unpredictable, heroes with different abilities. Attack of a large number of low-grade aliens to test own military wisdom. Free position, Easy upgrade
Grow easily and receive plentiful rewards, not even online. Collect daily login great rewards on your way to becoming stronger. Massive heroes, endless combinations
The game with a large number of combinable heroes, several styles and factions, everyone can create their own exclusive team.
A variety of competitions, Endless fun
Arena, War Game, Pinnacle Competition, Battle of God's and many other competitive modes await as you join and lead your team to fight for the supreme glory.
Massive gameplay, extreme fun
Various gameplays such as Djinni's Coming, Reward Tasks, Hela's Abyss, Warsong, Pantheon and etc. will give you a different experience
